trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that extends <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"></xref> to specify whether errors are tolerated while loading a design document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface que expande <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost"> </xref> para especificar se os erros são tolerated ao carregar um documento de design.

trans-unit.source: Use the IDesignerLoaderHost2 interface to specify whether the designer loader can continue loading when errors occur during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a interface IDesignerLoaderHost2 para especificar se o carregador do estruturador pode continuar a carregar quando ocorrerem erros durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is possible to reload with errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é possível recarregar com erros.

trans-unit.source: In some scenarios, loading errors cannot be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns cenários, carregar erros não pode ser ignorada.

trans-unit.source: The designer loader implementation should return `false` when this is the case.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do carregador de estruturador deverá devolver `false` quando for este o caso.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader can reload the design document when errors are detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o carregador do estruturador pode recarregar o documento de design quando são detetados erros; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether errors should be ignored when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*> is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os erros devem ser ignoradas quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*>é chamado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload*>

trans-unit.source: The IgnoreErrorsDuringReload property can only be set to `true` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IgnoreErrorsDuringReload só pode ser definida como `true` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `false`, the value of IgnoreErrorsDuringReload is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>é `false`, o valor de IgnoreErrorsDuringReload é ignorado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer loader will ignore errors when it reloads; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o carregador do estruturador irá ignorar erros quando-reloads; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
